bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
A newer version of python-msgpack is available [0]. I'm hoping that 0.4.8 can be built and added to F24+.
I need this because I'm the maintainer of python-kombu and version python-msgpack 0.4.8 is required before I can update the python-kombu to it's latest version 3.0.35. python-kombu 3.0.36 is also about to come out and that is also blocked.
[0]: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/msgpack-python/0.4.8
python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-769efc6e89
python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-ef23f18380
python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-66b2d1d82c

python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-ef23f18380

python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-66b2d1d82c

See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2016-769efc6e89
python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.fc23 has been pushed to the Fedora 23 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
python-msgpack-0.4.8-1.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
